messages: You dream of warm, alien winds.
You dream of landscapes lit by the light of alien moons.
You stand at the edge of a fissure into strange earth.  Mustard brown gasses caress and lift your fronds
You dream of being vivsected by humans.  One asks if the other thinks you can feel pain.
Trapped in a cage, you mimic the sounds of your guard's spawn.  He threatens you and enters the cage.  He screams, you recall.
It's your birthday.  But everyone has given you these hideous metal and plastic objects.
The stars await you, your chariot of fire is ready.  The holds are full of slaves.
You have transitioned from a dying race to a glorious future.
